title: RimWorldAlpha4c Windows
description:
A sci-fi colony sim driven by an intelligent AI storyteller.

RimWorld follows three survivors from a crashed space liner as they build a colony on a frontier world at the rim of the galaxy.


Alpha 4 has been hotfixed to Alpha4c.

Alpha4b added the source code which is supposed to be included.

Alpha4c fixes the storytellers, who had a bug that made them permanently placid instead of ramping up over long games. Now they will ramp up properly and eventually, probably, kill you. But hey, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all about the drama!

Sorry about that. Testing storytellers properly is hard because it takes so long and the results are so noisy.
Your savegames from Alpha 4 will still work.


Remember to support the creator of the game if you enjoyed it!
